outputs.output_descr: The initiation plan is to design and prepare Full Scale Proposal documents for GEF-funded project on "Scale Up to Access to Clean Energy for Rural Productive & Domestic Uses". A national team of consultants and an International Consultant will be engaged to help in preparing the FSP documents. The National Consulting team is expected to provide detailed technical inputs, preparing the field implementation plans, while the International Consultant will help bringing international experience in designing the project, help prepare it in the formats complying with GEF/UNDP.  The outputs of the PPG plan will be development of FSP documents namely, (i) UNDP Project Document, (ii) CEO endorsement request document. These will be submitted to GEF after due diligence by UNDP India, Bangkok and Headquarters for approval of GEF.
outputs.output_title: Scale up of Access to Clean En

project_descr: Scale up of Access to Clean Energy for Rural Productive and Domestice Uses (PPG)
project_title: Scale up of Access to Clean Energy (PPG)
